title: Webcam turning on and showing up when I play League
body:
Hello,

I have noticed since the last patch that my webcam turns on and is shown in the top right corner of the screen whenever I play. I can't find a setting to turn this off anywhere. Please help!

replies.body: What?  That's really weird!  Are you using any third party programs or an overlay that is set to make that happen?  There shouldn't be anything causing your webcam to show up in-game, and there would be no reason to.  Let me know.

I have OBS when I stream but I don't have anything else that i get running when playing LoL unless I'm streaming.  I have an NVIDEA and EGameforce but I've had that since forever and its literally just started happening.
